column4: if you're helping Aishiko can ya help me too :p i've got a sound card problem also
it depends on your soundcard manufacturer. Have you searched by your model name in ubuntuforums.org ?
hi it's me again, the Envy sound card i run  has got compatibility problems, but i haven't found an answer yet
your issue is a bit too complicated to be dealed in real time chat. Consider posting in the ubuntuforums.org a detailed post asking for help.
